mapper.select: select dno, writer, content, tag, writedate, image, mapLoc, mapXY, goodcnt, replycnt, user_image from oc_document, oc_user where tag LIKE '%'||#{tag}||'%' AND oc_document.writer = oc_user.user_id order by writedate desc
select user_id, user_name, user_image from oc_user where user_id != #{my_id} AND user_id != 'admin' AND user_id LIKE #{user_id} || '%' OR user_name LIKE #{user_name} || '%' order by user_id desc
